response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value, just like you do, and we believe it would be a perfect match for your needs and aspirations. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $14,000. This is an excellent chance to secure a high-quality asset at a favorable rate. Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 14000}
